attributes.action: Send UK Special Forces to Uganda to apprehend Joseph Kony
attributes.additional_details: We, the people of the UK, demand that the UK Government send team of combat ready Special Forces to Uganda to support the current deployment of US troops in their mission to disarm and capture Joseph Kony - leader of the LRA, who is responsible for the forced recruitment of over 66,000 children as soldiers and sex slaves.  While this is not in the UK foreign policy interest, it is the right thing to do!
